summary: This document is a chain of emails from October 2020 between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and staff at the Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller's office. The federal prosecutor is requesting guidance on obtaining grand jury materials from the 2006 state prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein for use in the ongoing federal investigation into Epstein and the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails discuss procedures, including providing a signed unsealing order.

persons.name: Cindy Guerra
persons.role: Chief Operating Officer for Courts and Legal Records, Acting General Counsel
persons.context: Staff member at the Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller's office who is the point of contact for the federal prosecutor's request to obtain grand jury materials from the Jeffrey Epstein case.

persons.name: Kathy Burstein
persons.context: Initial contact at the Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller's office who redirected the federal prosecutor's request to Cindy Guerra.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the original state grand jury proceedings in Palm Beach County (2006) and the ongoing federal investigation mentioned in the request.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the ongoing federal prosecution that the grand jury materials are being sought for.

connections.description: The document references the ongoing federal investigation regarding Epstein and prosecution of Maxwell, indicating their connection in the criminal case.
Both work for the Palm Beach County Clerk & Comptroller's office; Burstein connected the federal prosecutor to Guerra for the records request.

events.title: State Grand Jury Proceedings for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Grand jury presentations were held in Palm Beach County, Florida, in connection with the prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Federal Request for State Grand Jury Materials
events.description: Federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York correspond with Palm Beach County officials to request transcripts and records from the 2006 Epstein grand jury for their ongoing investigation.

locations: Southern District of New York, New York, NY 10007
15th Judicial Circuit, Palm Beach County, Florida
West Palm Beach, FL 33401 (301 N. Olive Ave., 9th Floor)
keyFacts: In October 2020, federal prosecutors from the SDNY were actively seeking grand jury materials from Jeffrey Epstein's 2006 state case in Palm Beach County for their ongoing investigation.
The request was explicitly connected to the federal investigation of Epstein and the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The procedure discussed involved the federal prosecutors obtaining an unsealing order from a federal judge to present to the state court.
The document references a specific Florida state case number: 50-2006-CF-009454 AXX.
The correspondence highlights the interaction between federal and state jurisdictions in a high-profile investigation.
